response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Considering its unique features and unparalleled benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for superior products. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 9500}
